items.title: Astera Labs (NASDAQ:ALAB) Shares Gap Up After Analyst Upgrade
items.summary: Astera Labs (NASDAQ:ALAB) Shares Gap Up After Analyst Upgrade - Astera Labs, Inc. (NASDAQ:ALAB – Get Free Report) gapped up before the market opened on Monday after Jefferies Financial Group raised their price target on the stock from $95.00 to $130.00.

items.summary: Amazon announces closure of its AI research lab in Shanghai, joining other US tech companies like IBM and Microsoft in scaling back operations in China due to geopolitical tensions.

While these AI entities offer continuous support, specialists warn about the potential risks stemming from an unregulated AI landscape.

items.title: To beat the AI squeeze, Newsweek is building revenue beyond traffic
items.summary: Newsweek is diversifying revenue streams beyond traffic by launching subscription products and expanding non-advertising streams to prepare for AI answer engines potentially reducing publisher traffic.
